plotzy.summary: Live zoning lookups functional. Clear product vision: comprehensive spatial analysis from address input.

items.text: Live zoning lookups working: Edmond OK (Zone A), OKC (R-1 with CUP risk flagged)
Underwriting skill tested on real property: 32nd St Apts, OKC (deal analysis: doesn't pencil at $1.2M)
Zoning database: 10 cities, 120K zones, 566 MB spatial data acquired from public sources
Product vision: address → zoning + parcel boundary + surrounding parcels + property data + risk assessment
Trust signal approach: screenshot public GIS portals rather than generate custom maps
Technical barriers: OKC GIS has CAPTCHA, county assessors block VPS datacenter IPs
CRE data layers identified: spatial, property, market, transactions, income, demographics, regulatory, risk
Package complete system as OpenClaw skill (not yet built)
Coverage: CA (LA/Sacramento/SF) | TX (Austin/Dallas) | FL (Tampa/Miami/Orlando/FtL) | OK (Norman)
